name: BottomlessWater
title: Bottomless Water
author: gjdunga
description: Lets players place water containers that stay full (LiquidContainer): water catchers, barrels, etc. Per-player toggle, permission-based, admin controls.

permissions.name: bottomlesswater.use
permissions.description: Allows a player to enable/disable bottomless water for their own placed containers.

permissions.name: bottomlesswater.admin
permissions.description: Allows an admin to toggle or query other players via console/RCON and use reload/status commands.

commands.description: Player chat command to manage bottomless water preference.
Admin console/RCON command to control a specific player.
Admin console/RCON command to show status for one player or all.
Admin console/RCON command to reload config safely at runtime.
